title: Who am I? (Forum game)
body:
I will give a description of a champion, and you will have to guess who it is!

Winner gets to continue the chain :)

My champion:

Who am I? I tried to silence one of my parents before and I have a daughter.

replies.body: {{champion:38}}

> [{quoted}](name=Mar3thyu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-19T09:53:32.249+0000)
>
> {{champion:38}}

Your turn :)

I'll make the next one cuz why not.

*"Chaos is my name and killing is my game"* 

Who am I?

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-19T13:04:35.150+0000)
>
> I'll make the next one cuz why not.
> 
> *"Chaos is my name and killing is my game"* 
> 
> Who am I?

Shaco

Shaco is an anagram for Chaos

Amirite?
Yeah, didn't expect anyone to get it so quickly :P

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-03-20T06:39:49.304+0000)
>
> Yeah, didn't expect anyone to get it so quickly :P

I've played this game for a while now, I love the "old" lore so ya :D

Who am I? Gragas is my drinking buddy :D

We are doing this on two different threads, people are probably pissed xD

To answer the 'Who am I?', Jax.

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=0000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-20T10:38:40.895+0000)
>
> We are doing this on two different threads, people are probably pissed xD
> 
> To answer the 'Who am I?', Jax.

Your turn :)

*"Fear... No, I am the mindkiller"* 

Who am I?

Please answer these honestly, don't go search em up :P

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=000000000000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-20T16:03:42.126+0000)
>
> *"Fear... No, I am the mindkiller"* 
> 
> Who am I?
> 
> Please answer these honestly, don't go search em up :P

I don't search them up...but I'll have to think about this one...

As for now...Nocturne??????????????
Haha, nope, not Nocturne :)

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=00000000000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-21T01:10:14.282+0000)
>
> Haha, nope, not Nocturne :)

Urgot or Yorick? I remember the scary trio (Nocturne, Fiddle and Shaco) but none of them have the personalities to say that.....
Yeah, it's Urgot. The quote is one of his taunts. Took you a lot of guesses xD
That's gotta be Rammus

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=0000000000000000000100000000000000000000000000020000,timestamp=2015-03-22T06:06:28.960+0000)
>
> Yeah, it's Urgot. The quote is one of his taunts. Took you a lot of guesses xD

Looks like we're the only two here...

We should have a duel lol

Who am I? I had my voice over lines accidentally deleted and Rito didn't bother making me a new set...

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=00000000000000000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-21T01:10:14.282+0000)
>
> Haha, nope, not Nocturne :)

Teemo? He's pretty 'mindkilling'...

>
> Haha, nope, not Nocturne :)

Fear.........mindkiller..............


wathafak

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-20T03:14:30.596+0000)
>
> Shaco
> 
> Shaco is an anagram for Chaos
> 
> Amirite?

I knew that but it it still surprises me whenever someone mentions it.
Who am I? I fell asleep for 100 years and wear a witch cap

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BG6MtbEb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-22T06:56:04.737+0000)
>
> Who am I? I fell asleep for 100 years and wear a witch cap

Umm...you're not supposed to start a new one before the previous one is answered...
I love giving poros moustaches
{{champion:6}}
I can see you copied me (:}
